summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2003 MITSUBISHI GALANT.  ON THE DRIVER SIDE OF THE ROOF AND HOOD, THE PAINT IS FADING FROM DARK BLACK TO LIGHT GRAY.  THE FADING WORSENS AFTER THE VEHICLE IS WASHED.  SHE TOOK THE VEHICLE TO AN AUTO BODY SHOP AND WAS INFORMED THAT THE CLEAR COATING ON TOP OF THE BLACK PAINT WAS CAUSING THE FAILURE.  THE VEHICLE HAS NOT BEEN REPAIRED.  THE MANUFACTURER HAS NOT BEEN NOTIFIED.  THE FAILURE AND CURRENT MILEAGES WERE 55,000.
